name: INJECTION (ButterMun)
description:
It's time for a MASSIVE cleanup!

In this dynamic and hardcore 2D platformer, you play as a former chemical factory worker who has gone up against his INSANE management team as they prepare for a MASSIVE CHEMICAL WAR!
However, these assholes prepared themselves and hired a private military group to protect their "work"

But that's not going to save them...

GET READY FOR:

  • TONS of enemies
  • LOTS of guns
  • INSANITY
  • ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF DEATHS

Don't miss the opportunity to nail these bastards!

TEAM

Buttermun - Idea, Programming, UI, Music

Kinoplenka - Animator,Artist, Play tester

Cfif126 - Play tester, Idea generator

We are ambitious people and want to share our creativity with all gamers of the world ;)
